Package ece325_lab_assignment4

Class ZooShow

java.lang.Object
ece325_lab_assignment4.Zoo
ece325_lab_assignment4.ZooShow
public class ZooShow
extends Zoo
Creates a show object which will create a tracking sheet for tracking animals being fed, as well as creating an Artist object which will play music and feed ZooAnimals.

Tasks that will be carried out in the Main Function:

  • Creating an Artist object.
  • Creating a ZooShow object.
  • Continually check if animals have been fed.
  • Randomly select new animal try and feed.
  • Keep track of music being played

Designed to be used with Artist class.

Version:
1.00.1
Author:
jeastgaa

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    ZooShow​(Artist artist)
    Will use Zoo constructor and set the Artist to the parameter given as well as Initialize all other global variables to null.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.io.File getFile()
    Will return the file used in this object to record the feeding of the animals.
    void giveArtistRecord()
    This will give artist the output file in order for Artist to write to it.
    boolean isMusicPlaying()
    Check if music is playing at the show
    static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
    Main Method of the program that will run the whole show.
    void setPlaying​(boolean playing)
    Attempts to set the isPlaying variable to the given boolean value (50% chance of success).
    void startMusic()
    Try and start music at the show, there is a 50% chance of success.
    void stopMusic()
    This will stop the whole show by stopping music, ending the feed recording file and displaying a message to stdout that the show is over.

  • Constructor Details

    • ZooShow

      public ZooShow​(Artist artist)
      Will use Zoo constructor and set the Artist to the parameter given as well as Initialize all other global variables to null. Attempts to read/create output file named as animalFeedingRecord.txt.
      Parameters:
      artist - the Artist object that will control music playing and animal feeding.
      See Also:
      Artist

  • Method Details

    • setPlaying

      public void setPlaying​(boolean playing)
      Attempts to set the isPlaying variable to the given boolean value (50% chance of success).

      WARNING: If set to false then ZooAnimal.feed() will throw NotPlayingException.x

      Parameters:
      playing - the boolean representing what isPlaying is trying to be set to.
      See Also:
      NotPlayingException

    • isMusicPlaying

      public boolean isMusicPlaying()
      Check if music is playing at the show
      Returns:
      isPlaying global boolean.

    • startMusic

      public void startMusic()
      Try and start music at the show, there is a 50% chance of success.

    • stopMusic

      public void stopMusic()
      This will stop the whole show by stopping music, ending the feed recording file and displaying a message to stdout that the show is over.

    • getFile

      public java.io.File getFile()
      Will return the file used in this object to record the feeding of the animals.
      Returns:
      output

    • giveArtistRecord

      public void giveArtistRecord()
      This will give artist the output file in order for Artist to write to it.

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      Main Method of the program that will run the whole show. It will use all classes in the ece325_lab_assignment package. Running it will create a record of feeding errors and notification of when the show is over through the stdout. Do not give any arguments to main method for marking.
      Parameters:
      args - standard program arguments, if string 'false' is given one and only argument then debug will be set to false and program will run as intended for client.
